Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Note: HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) is a material property that refers to the energy level of the last electron in a molecule's valence band. The other entities in the paragraph refer to specific groups of atoms in a molecule.
